official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to designate the Chicago-Calumet Skyway, Illinois, as part of the Interstate System upon the elimination of tolls and payment of all debt on such road, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to designate the Chicago-Calumet Skyway in Illinois as a route on the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways, upon determining that: (1) Illinois has taken title to such route; (2) such route has been made toll free; and (3) obligations for such tolls have been repaid.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to designate the Chicago-Calumet Skyway, Illinois, as part of the Interstate System upon the elimination of tolls and payment of all debt on such road, and for other purposes.
